name: Death Football: a Double-barreled Kick-Off
description:
Death Football is a  1-vs-1 fast paced game with shotguns, rendered in glorious 288p

2 Modes available:

Classic - classic style football

Capture-the-Gun -  shotgun spawns in the field, and it is up to you to choose; will you try to shoot for the goal or rush for the gun

Controls:

Player 1: W-A-S-D

Player 2: ←↑ →↓

"E" - return to Main Menu

"C" - change camera angle
